alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:07PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Itawamba, northeastern Lee and southeastern Prentiss Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 907 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guntown, or near Baldwyn, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Saltillo, Guntown, Thrashers, Blair, Wheeler, Pratts Friendship, Marietta, Chapelville, Thrasher, Kirkville, Corrona, Unity, Hobo Station, Frankstown, Bethany and Altitude. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
